committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation honoring "Max", a yellow Labrador Retriever.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation honoring Max, a guide dog for the blind, as a symbol of the contribution that the handicapped can make to helping themselves and others.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation honoring "Max", a yellow Labrador Retriever.
